T02D1574:5b-1: shr'i badzra b'a r'a h'i pra dzny'a a'a lo ke kri tya sto tra n'a ma /
T02D1574:5b-3: dpal rdo rje phag mo shes rab gsal byed ma'i bstod ba zhes bya ba /
T02D1574:5b-4: dpal rdo rje pag mo la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1574:5b-5: g-yas brkyang g-yon bskum gar stabs bzhengs pa ni //
T02D1574:5b-6: gzi ldan blta bas mi ngoms yid 'phrog ma //
T02D1574:5b-7: 'dzum ldan zur gzigs sgeg mo'i zhabs pad la //
T02D1574:5b-8: bdag blo gus pas spyi bos gus phyag 'tshal //
T02D1574:5b-9: skyabs sems tshad med bzhi bsgoms rang snying gar //
T02D1574:5b-10: aom gyur nyi steng hr'i: dkar 'od 'phros pas /
T02D1574:5b-11: khyod sogs rgyal ba sras bcas sgeg mo'i tshogs //
T02D1574:5b-12: phyag 'tshal mchod sogs gar byed la phyag 'tshal //
T02D1574:5b-13: sngags kyis stong par rab sbyangs pam yig las //
T02D1574:5b-14: padma'i steng du aam gyur nyi ma'i steng //
T02D1574:5b-15: h'um gyur nyi dkyil hr'i: dkar rdo rjes mtshan //
T02D1574:5b-16: yongs gyur dpa' mo'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1574:5b-17: khyod sku gcer bu zhal gcig mche ba gtsigs //
T02D1574:5b-18: cung zad khros pa'i smin g-yo spyan gsum dmar //
T02D1574:5b-19: khrag 'dzag mi mgo lnga bcu'i do shal gyis //
T02D1574:5b-20: sku brgyan 'jigs med sku la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1574:5b-21: chu shel ltar gsal dung gi mdog 'dra zhing //
T02D1574:5b-22: sna tshogs 'khor lo rgyan cha lnga yis brgyan //
T02D1574:5b-23: yid 'ong sil sil dar dpyangs 'phur lding gis //
T02D1574:5b-24: rab dgyes bzhad ma'i gsung la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1574:5b-25: phyag gnyis g-yas pa rdo rjes dbugs bral la //
T02D1574:5b-26: bsnun 'phyar g-yon pa gru mor kha tv'am dang //
T02D1574:5b-27: bdud bzhi'i thod khrag thugs kar bsnams nas gsol //
T02D1574:5b-28: 'jigs rung sgrogs pa'i gsung la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1574:5b-29: sna tshogs padma'i steng na nyi ma la //
T02D1574:5b-30: skyes bu dbugs bral mgo bo g-yas bstan steng //
T02D1574:5b-31: zhabs gnyis g-yas brkyang g-yon bskum gar stabs bzhugs //
T02D1574:5b-32: rngam 'jigs drag sgrogs gsung la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1574:6a-2: g-yas g-yon rgyab 'phyang phyed bcings thor tshugs na //
T02D1574:6a-3: sems can kun la brtse ba'i mi bskyod 'dzin //
T02D1574:6a-4: snying rjes sngags 'chang thugs la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1574:6a-5: ye shes lnga mtshon gangs ri ltar dkar ba'i //
T02D1574:6a-6: thod skam lnga yis khyod kyi dbu la brgyan //
T02D1574:6a-7: rngam pa'i tshul gyis bdud bzhi 'dul la brtson //
T02D1574:6a-8: bgegs 'dul rngam ma'i thugs la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1574:6a-9: zla ba'i 'od zer bcu drug lon pa'i gzugs //
T02D1574:6a-10: lang tsho rab rgyas sgeg mo'i sprul pa yis //
T02D1574:6a-11: lha mo sna tshogs kun nas spro bsdu bas //
T02D1574:6a-12: bdag mchod dgyes bzhi'i thugs la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1574:6a-13: mi shes blo yi rab rib bsal ba'i phyir //
T02D1574:6a-14: lte bar chu skyes ge sar g-yo ba'i dbus //
T02D1574:6a-15: tsha zer rgyal po 'od zer 'bar ba'i steng //
T02D1574:6a-16: hr'im bzhugs 'od dkar 'phro la phyag 'tshal lo ;
T02D1574:6a-17: / hr'i: dkar dh'u t'i nas bzhugs zhal nas 'thon //
T02D1574:6a-18: 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phros nas sangs rgyas dang //
T02D1574:6a-19: mkhas pa'i yon tan bstan bcos sgyu rtsal sogs //
T02D1574:6a-20: 'od kyis lte bar sdud la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1574:6a-21: de dag myur bar mgal me'i 'khor lo bzhin //
T02D1574:6a-22: lte ba nas zhugs zhal nas rab 'khor zhing //
T02D1574:6a-23: 'od zer yon tan dang bcas gter bsdus nas //
T02D1574:6a-24: rab 'khor shes rab stsol la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1574:6a-25: khyod kyi blo gros rta bdun 'od zer gyis //
T02D1574:6a-26: gdul bya'i blo yi pad tshal rgyas byed cing //
T02D1574:6a-27: blo ngan blo yi mun pa sel mdzad pa //
T02D1574:6a-28: phrin las 'od tshogs 'phro la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1574:6a-29: khyod kyi thabs mkhas thugs rje'i rgya mtsho las //
T02D1574:6a-30: 'jigs 'joms dbang sdud dug sel shes rab sogs //
T02D1574:6a-31: pad 'khrungs dngos grub sbrang rtsis gus ldan gyi //
T02D1574:6a-32: bung ba tshim par mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1574:6a-33: khyod kyi yon tan mtha' yas sangs rgyas mkhyen //
T02D1574:6a-34: bdag 'dras shes min sa bcu'i sems dpas kyang //
T02D1574:6a-35: bskal brgyar brjod kyang brjod par ga la nus //
T02D1574:6a-36: dang ga med yon tan mnga' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1574:6b-0: dngos su bshams dang blo yis sprul pa @6b yi ;
T02D1574:6b-1: / yon chab me tog bdug spos mar me dang //
T02D1574:6b-2: dri chab zhal zas rol mo ci mchis rnams //
T02D1574:6b-3: blo yis blangs nas gus pa'i yid kyis mchod //
T02D1574:6b-4: dug gsum dbang gis sgo gsum mi dge'i las //
T02D1574:6b-5: gang bgyis ma lus rmongs pa'i yid kyis bshags //
T02D1574:6b-6: rang gzhan dge ba ji snyed bgyis kun la //
T02D1574:6b-7: bdag dang dga' ba'i blo yis rjes yi rang //
T02D1574:6b-8: bla med theg mchog ston pa'i gsung rab la //
T02D1574:6b-9: dri med chos kyi 'khor lo bskor du gsol //
T02D1574:6b-10: srid pa'i rgya mtsho ji srid ma bskams par //
T02D1574:6b-11: de srid yun du brtse bas bzhugs su gsol //
T02D1574:6b-12: bdag gis khyod kyi yon tan phyogs cha tsam //
T02D1574:6b-13: gus pa'i yid kyis bstod pa'i dge ba des //
T02D1574:6b-14: bdag ni 'gro ba'i ma rig mun sel zhing //
T02D1574:6b-15: rdo rje 'chang gi go 'phang thob par shog /
T02D1574:6b-16: dpal rdo rje phag mo shes rab gsal byed ma'i
T02D1574:6b-17: bstod pa slob dpon kong ka na p'a das mdzad
T02D1574:6b-19: / pandi ta ratna rakshi ta dang /
